title: The Comparison Page
subtitle: Comparing cryptocurrency market prices across exchanges
body: When using InterTrader, if you're not [searching for profitable trades](/user-guide/finding-profitable-cryptocurrency-pairs/ "Finding profitable cryptocurrency pairs: search and analysis") , a lot of your time will be spent on the comparison page, where you can see: * Prices of a cryptocurrency pair across multiple exchanges * Potential profit * Orderbooks from the exchanges where the coin is listed ## Price chart The prominent bar chart on the comparison page provides a quick overview of the buy and sell price across all the exchanges for which InterTrader has coin pair data. ![Price chart](/gin-data/images/1527802167227-compare-crypto-chart.png) ## Price analysis Tapping bulb icon to the right of the chart displays the price analysis summary for the coin. This is the buy/sell price information described in the [search and analysis guide](/user-guide/finding-profitable-cryptocurrency-pairs/#what-it-all-means "Finding profitable cryptocurrency pairs"). If there is potential profit to be earned, it is displayed here. ![Price analysis](/gin-data/images/1527802334136-compare-crypto-analysis.png) ## Exchange details Below the bar chart are the numerical buy and sell prices for each exchange. You'll also find the coin name, where available, so you can more easily determine if the coins sharing the same ticker are being compared. > The quality of information returned from each exchange varies considerably. For this reason, the ticker symbol is the most reliable way to match and compare coins â€” but it isn't perfect. Make sure you verify that you're not trying to intertrade two different coins. ![Price details](/gin-data/images/1527802183524-compare-crypto-details.png) ## Orderbook Tap the list icon for each exchange to see their orderbooks. InterTrader returns the last five buy and sell orders so that you can more quickly determine if there is enough supply and demand to make a profitable trade. ![Orderbook](/gin-data/images/1527803518235-compare-crypto-orderbook.png)
